    • Uses of DataRequiredCI.DataI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors

      Methods in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors that return DataRequiredCI.DataI 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DataRequiredCI.DataI AbstractDataConnector.offered2required​(DataOfferedCI.DataI d)  
      DataRequiredCI.DataI DataConnectorI.offered2required​(DataOfferedCI.DataI d)
      translate data as defined by the offered interface into data as defined in the required interface.
      DataRequiredCI.DataI ActiveDataConnector.request()
      implements the required pull interface by taking a value from the data buffer if any, blocking if none.
      DataRequiredCI.DataI DataConnector.request()
      pass the request for a new datum from the requiring component to the offering component.
      Methods in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors with parameters of type DataRequiredCI.DataI 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DataOfferedCI.DataI AbstractDataConnector.required2offered​(DataRequiredCI.DataI d)  
      DataOfferedCI.DataI DataConnectorI.required2offered​(DataRequiredCI.DataI d)
      translate data as defined by the required interface into data as defined in the offered interface.

    • Uses of DataRequiredCI.DataI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports

      Methods in fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports that return DataRequiredCI.DataI 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DataRequiredCI.DataI AbstractDataOutboundPort.request()
      called by the requiring component in pull mode to trigger the obtaining of a piece of data from the offering one; this definition imposes the synchronized nature of the method, as it is called by the owner to get data from server components.
